gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class RecursiveScheduledReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.RecursiveScheduledReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecursiveScheduledMetricReporter

    public abstract class RecursiveScheduledReporter
extends com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
    Reports a Metric context and all of its descendants recursively.

      • reportContextTree

        public void reportContextTree(com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry registry)
        Report a MetricRegistry. If the input is a MetricContext it will also report all of its children recursively.
        Parameters:
        registry - MetricRegistry to report.
